content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go

if OBJECT_id('silver.trip_data_green') is not null 
    drop EXTERNAL table silver.trip_data_green go


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_data_green 
    with(
        LOCATION = 'silver_layer/trip_data_green',
        DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquert_file
    )as 
    select * from bronze.trip_data_csv go 

select * from silver.trip_data_green go
